item.description:
1. SanDisk Announces Exclusive microSD Card and NVMe SSD for ROG Xbox Ally Handhelds  TechPowerUp
  2. Asus ROG Xbox Ally X – The Final Preview  IGN
  3. Sandisk launches officially licensed SSDs and MicroSD cards for the ROG Xbox Ally series — up to 4TB of storage for new Asus flagship handheld  Tom's Hardware
  4. Microsoft and Asus open Xbox Ally preorders — the X costs $999  The Verge
  5. Ready to Play Anywhere? Players Can Now Pre-Order the ROG Xbox Ally X and ROG Xbox Ally In 38 Countries  Xbox Wire
